description: Whether you're looking for a short 1km stroll or a full day of over 20km, this full-colour guidebook is sure to include something that suits your fancy. The 35 hiking loops cover Cambridge, Kitchener, Woolwich, St. Jacobs, Elora, Erin, Fergus, Elmira and Rockwood areas. Each hike includes a detailed map, precise directions, colour photos, local lore and even recommendations on where to grab a latte or lunch nearby.
name: Loops & Lattes Hiking Guides Waterloo, Wellington & Guelph Hikes
